adqlParser.query.function
Class Exists

java.lang.Object
  adqlParser.query.ADQLConstraint
      adqlParser.query.function.ADQLFunction
          adqlParser.query.function.Exists
All Implemented Interfaces:
ADQLObject, ADQLOperand
public class Exists
extends ADQLFunction

Represents the function EXISTS of SQL and ADQL.
This function returns true if the sub-query given in parameter returns at least one result, else it returns false.

Version:
06/2010
Author:
Grégory Mantelet (CDS)
See Also:
ADQLFunction
